lead_paragraph: Managers head to the mound and point to the bullpens so often in the postseason, it wouldn't be surprising if they need Tommy John surgery.

headline.print_headline: Matchup Madness Means More Relievers, Longer Games
headline.main: Matchup Madness Means More Relievers, Longer Games

snippet: Managers head to the mound and point to the bullpens so often in the postseason, it wouldn't be surprising if they need Tommy John surgery....
